attributes.action: Make 'None of the Above' an option on all ballot papers
attributes.additional_details: We want 'None of the Above' put on the ballot paper, so this is included in the vote count and everyone can see how many people have voted for this and to give a true figure of how many people don’t want to vote for any of the listed candidates.
attributes.background: We believe it is our duty to vote as many people died in order to secure us the privilege. The only way I can express my view of election candidates is to spoil my ballot paper. I feel that there should be a box which allows me to vote for 'none of the above', which will reflect my feelings.
